title: SpeakUp
description:
Speaker search app. Where speakers can respond to events and journalistic inquiries. 
- An app for android and iOS. Free commissions. The organizer creates an event where all the conditions are specified: location, topic, speaker requirements, cost per speech or free, and the like. 
- Speakers can respond to requests from organizers or journalists.
- The speaker can write a review about the organization of the event, and the event can write a review about the speaker's speech.
